metadata.title: CVE-2021-47006 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ARM: 9064/1: hw_breakpoint: Do not directly check the event'soverflow_handler hookThe commit 1879445dfa7b ("perf/core: Set event's default::overflow_handler()") set a default event->overflow_handler inperf_event_alloc(), and replace the check event->overflow_handler withis_default_overflow_handler(), but one is missing.Currently, the bp->overflow_handler can not be NULL. As a result,enable_single_step() is always not invoked.Comments from Zhen Lei:https://patchwork.kernel.org/project/linux-arm-kernel/patch/20210207105934.2001-1-thunder.leizhen@huawei.com/
